channel.title: Last problem .. before my server hits the list
channel.description: At the current time when i am fighting.. a NPC or another person.. I cannot tele out of battle... before a message would display saying.. You can't tele during combat.. i deleted the message along with the return that was following that message.. and nothing.. i still can't teleport out during a battle... i want to enable this feature.. i want the user to be allowed to tele out of battle.. im using a 317 client please help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2010, 07:27:13 pm[/size][hr]bump.. still need help..

item.title: Last problem .. before my server hits the list
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[code] public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
resetWalkingQueue();
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()) {
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);
return;
}
if(saraKills > 0){
saraKills = 0;
sM(“All the Saradomin kills have been drained from your body…”);
return;
}
if(isInPitGame()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(inCombat){
sM(“You can’t teleport in Combat!”);
return;
}
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) {
sM(“You are teleblocked!”);
return;
}
}

public void triggerTele2(int x, int y, int height) {
                    triggerTele(x, y, height);
  			tX = x;
  			tY = y;
  			tH = height;
		if(playerAncientMagics == 2){
			tStage = 3;
			tTime2 = 0;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
		}
		if(playerAncientMagics == 1){
			tStage = 1;
			tTime = 0;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
		}
		if(playerAncientMagics == 0){
			tStage = 3;
			tTime2 = 0;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
		}
  			followID = 0;
  			followID2 = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		resetKnight();
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Last problem .. before my server hits the list
item.dc:creator: @Shelby14705 Shelby14705
item.description:
@Shelby14705 wrote:

[code] public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) {
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
resetWalkingQueue();
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);
return;
}
if(saraKills > 0){
saraKills = 0;
sM(“All the Saradomin kills have been drained from your body…”);
}
if(isInPitGame()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}

if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) {
sM(“You are teleblocked!”);
return;
}

public void triggerTele2(int x, int y, int height) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) {
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
resetWalkingQueue();
if(saraKills > 0){
saraKills = 0;
sM(“All the Saradomin kills have been drained from your body…”);
}
if(isInPitGame()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM(“You can’t teleport away!”);
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) {
sM(“You are teleblocked!”);
return;
}
if(action == 1){
return;
}
if(IsInFightCave()){
sM(“You cannot teleport out of the minigame!”);
return;
}
tX = x;
tY = y;
tH = height;
if(playerAncientMagics == 2){
tStage = 3;
tTime2 = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
}
if(playerAncientMagics == 1){
tStage = 1;
tTime = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}
if(playerAncientMagics == 0){
tStage = 3;
tTime2 = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
followID = 0;
followID2 = 0;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
resetKnight();
}
}
[/code]

You should just have to remove this: (The above code I removed the following)

if(inCombat){ sM("You can't teleport in Combat!"); return; }

I don’t code 317s tho, But that should be what is stopping you from teleporting in combat

item.dc:creator: @phillip7112 phillip7112
item.description:
@phillip7112 wrote:

Ok i tried deleting the printing 2 screen message with the return statement… and that didn’t work

	public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) {
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			resetWalkingQueue();
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM("You can't teleport away!");
return;
}
if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!");
return;
}
if(saraKills > 0){
saraKills = 0;
sM("All the Saradomin kills have been drained from your body..");
}
if(isInPitGame()){
sM("You can't teleport away!");
return;
}
if(inCombat){
sM("You can't teleport in Combat!");
return;
}
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM("You can't teleport away!");
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) {
sM("You are teleblocked!");
return;
}	

public void triggerTele2(int x, int y, int height) {
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) {
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			resetWalkingQueue();
if(saraKills > 0){
saraKills = 0;
sM("All the Saradomin kills have been drained from your body..");
}
if(isInPitGame()){
sM("You can't teleport away!");
return;
}
if(inPcGame() || inPcBoat()){
sM("You can't teleport away!");
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) {
sM("You are teleblocked!");
return;
}
if(action == 1){
return;
}
if(IsInFightCave()){
sM("You cannot teleport out of the minigame!");
return;
}
      tX = x;
      tY = y;
      tH = height;
if(playerAncientMagics == 2){
tStage = 3;
tTime2 = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
}
if(playerAncientMagics == 1){
tStage = 1;
tTime = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}
if(playerAncientMagics == 0){
tStage = 3;
tTime2 = 0;
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
      followID = 0;
      followID2 = 0;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
resetKnight();
		}
	}

Thats all the trigger tele code…
